column1: # "gaia_simple" remix - a smaller collection of biomes, decorations and ores, based on the
#   "gaia" remix, but with all ecosystems removed. This produces a less beautiful world but
# See the notes in the packages.csv file for the "gaia" remix, all of which apply to this remix as
# This package is an optional addition to the "gaia" remix, automatically overriding numerous
#   Minetest settings to produce a customised player experience. If you want it, uncomment the line
# This package converts dirts and dirts-with-turf near trees and ferns to woodsoils. You can enable
#   this package if you want that behaviour. However, it will only work as inteded if the override
#   package above has been enabled, or if you have added all dirt types to unilib's super dirt set
# This package, if available, produces an optimised version of decorations.csv, writing a new file
#   in the same folder. In testing, it reduces the size of decorations.csv by about 75%
#   - Uncomment the line below by removing the initial #
#   - Start a Minetest game, using the "gaia" remix, then shut down the client
#   - In the remix folder, rename the original file to something like "decorations_original.csv"
#   - Comment the line below by re-inserting the initial #
# Biome, ecosystem, decoration and ore packages ###################################################

column2: badlands darkage default glemr4 moreores technic underch unilib
